title: VSync is off, DVR is off, still capped at 60fps...
body:
Hey, so I bought a new Laptop and I had like 200+fps.
The next day I was capped at 60 and I tried everything, but nothing worked.
VSync in League is off, VSync in Nvidia is off, Xbox DVR is off...
I want my 200fps back.

replies.body: Thanks for the troubleshooting done so far!  With a new laptop, you may need to perform quite a few updates before you kick into gear!  I suggest going over each step in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to update your drivers and tune up your PC for league.  Hope that helps!
